name: YTLitePlus
subtitle: YTLitePlus official Altstore source.
description:
This is an Altstore source for YTLitePlus.

YTLitePlus is an enhanced Youtube app that offers a superior Youtube experience, combining YTLite (by @dayanch96) with numerous other tweaks.

For full details on what's included, check the GitHub repository:

https://github.com/mihirmodak/YTLitePlus

apps.name: YTLitePlus
apps.subtitle: YTLite with more features!
apps.versionDescription:
Current YouTube IPA: "21.06.2"  
Current YTLite Version: "5.2b4"  
Current App Compatibility: "iOS/iPadOS 15.0" or later

RELEASE 21.06.2-5.2b4: (2026-02-16)

• Updated Youtube to "21.06.2"
• Updated YTLite to "5.2b4"

Issues in this Release:
• LowContrastMode does not work *(Compatible only with YouTube v17.33.2-v17.38.10)*
• Hiding Shorts creates an empty space instead #55
apps.localizedDescription:
YTLite with more features!

YTLitePlus is an enhanced Youtube app that offers a superior Youtube experience, combining YTLite (by @dayanch96) with numerous other tweaks :

• YTLite
• YTUHD
• YouPiP
• YTABConfig
• YouMute
• DontEatMyContent
• Return YouTube Dislikes
• iSponsorBlock
• YouRememberCaption
• YTNoTracking
• YTUnShorts
• YTNoCheckLocalNetwork
• BigYTMiniPlayer
• YTSpeed
• YTHoldForSpeed
• YTVideoOverlay
• YouQuality
• YTNoModernUI
• OLEDDarkmode
• OLDDarkmode
• LowContrastMode
• YTNoSuggestedVideo

Credit

@Balackburn, @bhackel, @Deci8BelioS, @matt911, @arichornloverALT, @Macleykun, @AlexInABox, @SKEIDs, @VictorxD70, @Glenta, @zSaaiq, @MrAlucardDante, @gototheskinny, @asdfzxcvbn, @dayanch96, @ssuesskind, @MiRO92, @qnblackcat, @PoomSmart, @level3tjg, @BandarHL, @Galactic-Dev, @julioverne, @hbang, @Lyvendia, @therealFoxster, @ichitaso, @AhmedBafkir, @CokePokes, @ISnackable

privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: YTLitePlus requires access to your Apple Music library.
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: YTLitePlus requires Bluetooth access to connect with nearby peripherals.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: YTLitePlus requires access to the camera to capture photos and videos.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: YTLitePlus requires access to your contacts to help you share content with your friends.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: YTLitePlus requires local network access to connect and communicate with nearby devices.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: YTLitePlus requires access to your location while using the app to provide personalized recommendations.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: YTLitePlus requires access to your microphone to record audio.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: YTLitePlus requires access to your Photo Library to save photos and videos.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: To personalize ads and provide ad measurement, YTLitePlus will link activity from this app with activity from non-Google apps and websites.

Current YouTube IPA: "19.32.6"  
Current YTLite Version: "4.0.1"  
Current App Compatibility: "iOS/iPadOS 15.0" or later

RELEASE 19.32.6•4.0.1: (2024•08•14)

• Updated Youtube from "19.29.1" to "19.32.6"

New Features
• Added YouTimeStamp (@arichornloverALT)
• Added "Copy Settings" and "Paste Settings" (@arichornlover)
• Add reporting option (@bhackel)
• Live Chat OLED dark mode (@bhackel)
• Add Hide Speed Toast (@bhackel)

Bug Fixes
• Fix building on iOS 14 (@bhackel) [278](https://github.com/YTLitePlus/YTLitePlus/pull/278)
• Fix dylib injection issue (@bhackel)
• Fix YouTube Extensions bug (@bhackel)
• Fix delete workflows (@bhackel)
• Fix localization and copy/paste switch (@bhackel)
• Fix LowContrastMode description (@arichornlover)
• Fix build error (@bhackel)
• Fix OLED live chat (@bhackel) [331](https://github.com/YTLitePlus/YTLitePlus/pull/331)

Improvements
• Cleanup Makefile and actions script (@bhackel)
• Default disable big mini player (@bhackel)
• Hide comment previews (@bhackel)
• Hide autoplay mini preview (@bhackel)
• Remove YTLitePlus OLED Theme (@bhackel)
• Copy Hide HUD and Hide Collapse Button (@bhackel)

Localization
• Fix import/export settings localization (@bhackel)
• Turkish: Added proper localization (@gototheskinny) [283](https://github.com/YTLitePlus/YTLitePlus/pull/283), updated (@gototheskinny) [336](https://github.com/YTLitePlus/YTLitePlus/pull/336)
• Bulgarian: Added translations (@schweppes•0x) [332](https://github.com/YTLitePlus/YTLitePlus/pull/332)
• Portuguese: Updated localization (@VictorxD70) [326](https://github.com/YTLitePlus/YTLitePlus/pull/326)
• Added missing strings to localization (@Balackburn)
• Updated Localizable.strings (@manhchuduc) [305](https://github.com/YTLitePlus/YTLitePlus/pull/305)

Updated Submodules
• Added YouTimeStamp submodule
• DontEatMyContent
• YouGroupSettings
• YouTubeHeader
• iSponsorBlock
• YTABConfig
• YTUHD
• Return•YouTube•Dislikes
• YouMute
• protobuf 

Contributors
• @bhackel
• @arichornlover
• @gototheskinny
• @Balackburn
• @manhchuduc
• @VictorxD70
• @schweppes•0x

Issues in this Release:
• LowContrastMode does not work *(Compatible only with YouTube v17.33.2•v17.38.10)*
• YouTube crashing when viewing Shorts

Current YouTube IPA: "19.29.1"  
Current YTLite Version: "4.0.1"  
Current App Compatibility: "iOS/iPadOS 15.0" or later

RELEASE 19.29.1•4.0.1 (2024•07•22)

• Updated YouTube from "19.23.3" to "19.29.1"

New Features

• Added "Hide Home Tab" option ([@bhackel](https://github.com/bhackel)) [210]()
• Added "Fullscreen to the Right" option ([@arichornlover](https://github.com/arichornlover))
• Added "Disable Engagement Overlay" option ([@bhackel](https://github.com/bhackel))
• Added "Classic Seek Anywhere" gesture ([@bhackel](https://github.com/bhackel))
• Added YTHeaders submodule ([@Balackburn](https://github.com/Balackburn))

Bug Fixes

• Fixed escaping quotes issue ([@AlexInABox](https://github.com/AlexInABox)) [187]()
• Fixed SDK caching issues ([@arichornlover](https://github.com/arichornlover))
• Fixed crash caused by edge case ([@bhackel](https://github.com/bhackel))
• Fixed compilation errors ([@bhackel](https://github.com/bhackel))
• Fixed home contents bug ([@bhackel](https://github.com/bhackel))
• Fixed "Fullscreen to the Right" functionality ([@bhackel](https://github.com/bhackel))
• Fixed redefinition of •userInterfaceIdiom issue ([@asdfzxcvbn](https://github.com/asdfzxcvbn))

Improvements

• Cleaned up and added workflow settings ([@bhackel](https://github.com/bhackel))
• Updated compiling for YouTube v19.21.2+ ([@arichornloverALT](https://github.com/arichornloverALT))
• Removed deprecated and redundant code ([@bhackel](https://github.com/bhackel))
• Synchronized delete•workflow•runs.yml ([@arichornlover](https://github.com/arichornlover))

Localization

• Updated German translation for "CHANGE_APP_ICON" string ([@AlexInABox](https://github.com/AlexInABox)) [186]()
• Updated Portuguese localization ([@VictorxD70](https://github.com/VictorxD70)) [253](), [254]()
• Updated Spanish localization ([@Deci8BelioS](https://github.com/Deci8BelioS)) [260]()

Updated Submodules

• Updated submodules: protobuf, iSponsorBlock, Return•YouTube•Dislikes, YouPiP, YouQuality, YouTubeHeader, YTHoldForSpeed, YTUHD, YouGroupSettings, YouMute, DontEatMyContent ([@actions•user](https://github.com/actions•user))
• Replaced submodule at Tweaks/YouPiP with [https://github.com/bhackel/YouPiP](https://github.com/bhackel/YouPiP) ([@bhackel](https://github.com/bhackel))

Miscellaneous

• Synchronized uYouEnhanced templates ([@bhackel](https://github.com/bhackel))

Contributors

• [@AlexInABox](https://github.com/AlexInABox)
• [@Balackburn](https://github.com/Balackburn)
• [@arichornlover](https://github.com/arichornlover)
• [@bhackel](https://github.com/bhackel)
• [@asdfzxcvbn](https://github.com/asdfzxcvbn)
• [@VictorxD70](https://github.com/VictorxD70)
• [@Deci8BelioS](https://github.com/Deci8BelioS)

Issues in this Release

• LowContrastMode does not work _(Compatible only with YouTube v17.33.2•v17.38.10)_

Catbox

RELEASE 19.22.6•4.0.1: (2024•06•09)

• Updated Youtube from "19.21.3" to "19.22.6"
• Updated submodules
• Updated YTLite from "4.0" to "4.0.1"
    • Added ability to play videos in external players (System, Infuse, VLC)

    • Added option to keep Shorts videos in the Subscriptions tab (https://github.com/dayanch96/YTLite/issues/91)

    • Added ability to open shorts as regular videos using YTPlus menu button in Shorts

    • Added ability to enable/disable auto•skip shorts option using YTPlus menu button in Shorts

    • Added option to disable Autoplay end•screen recommendation (Enabling this option will also disable autoplay next video feature)

    • Improved Shorts downloading which directly downloads best mp4 video

    • Improved YTPlus button compatibility with the latest YouTube versions

    • Improved YTPlus button compatibility with Inline muted playback (Player that displayed on video thumbnail)

    • Fixed blank space issues on the big screens (https://github.com/dayanch96/YTLite/issues/105)

    • Fixed crashes when trying to show share sheet on iPad devices

    • Updated localization strings (https://github.com/dayanch96/YTLite/issues/106)

    • Corrected some localization strings (https://github.com/dayanch96/YTLite/issues/112)

    • Fixed an issue that caused the search bar to disappear (https://github.com/dayanch96/YTLite/issues/117)
  
Issues in this Release:
• LowContrastMode does not work *(Compatible only with YouTube v17.33.2•v17.38.10)*

    • Downloading feature
    • Tweak UI improvements
    • Added some player gestures
    • Added Import/Export settings feature (Tweak preferences)
    • Added Old/New UI toggle (Version spoofing)
    • Added options to remove community posts and inline comment under the player

    • Removed version spoofing on extra speed options and classic video quality as unneeded
    • Fixed issues related to Disable auto•caption feature
    • Fixed crashes related to Auto•quality feature

• LowContrastMode does not work *(Compatible only with YouTube v17.33.2•v17.38.10)*

RELEASE 19.09.3•3.0: (2024•03•06)

•  Updated YTLite from "2.7" to "3.0"
	• Added option to set premium logo
	• Added option to show ios volume hud in fullscreen mode
	• Added option to show end time in player bar
	• Added option to disable two finger double tap (snap to next chapter)
	• Added option to pause playback with overlay
	• Added option to auto•skip to next shorts video
	• Added option to call ios share sheet instead of yt's (Thanks to [[@jkhsjdhjs](https://github.com/jkhsjdhjs)](https://github.com/jkhsjdhjs))
	• Added Hold to speed customization feature
	• Added Default playback rate selection feature
	• Added the ability to show/hide the "You" tab (without it, settings is unreachable). Activates by long pressing on the Home tab.
	• Added the ability to instantly apply tab settings
	• Switched to custom UserDefaults class by extending NSUserDefaults (Thanks to [[@danpashin](https://github.com/danpashin)](https://github.com/danpashin))
	• Added a category to NSBundle for accessing a default bundle instance (Thanks to [[@danpashin](https://github.com/danpashin)](https://github.com/danpashin))

 ⚠️⚠️ All .ipa's will be removed within the next 24 hours because of a Youtube DMCA Notice ⚠️⚠️
Today I received a DMCA takedown notice for all the YTLitePlus ipa's, I will remove them tomorrow at 3:36 PM UTC 

For more information please check : 
https://www.reddit.com/r/jailbreak/comments/1b86tiz/balackburn_here_maintainer_of_ytliteplus_ive_just/

• Hiding Shorts creates an empty space instead 55

RELEASE 19.08.2•2.7: (2024•02•28)

• Updated Youtube from "19.06.2" to "19.08.2"
    • Fixed bugs, improved performance, drank way too much coffee.
    
• Updated YTLite from "2.6.1" to "2.7"
    • Copy post text feature replaced with Post manager: Copy post text or save/copy post as image 
    • Fixed copy comment issue
    • Copy comment text feature replaced with Comment manager: Copy comment text or save/copy comment as image
    • Auto select quality for Wifi and Cellular data (Default, Best or Custom quality)
    • Added options to hide Download, Watch later, Save to Playlist, Share, Not interested, Don't recommend and report buttons from the video menu 
    • Added options to hide Remix, Clip and Download buttons under the video player (Thanks to @PoomSmart)
    • Save Post image moved to Post manager (long tap on post) 
    • Improved YTLite UI
    
• Updated submodules 
    • iSponsorBlock
    • DontEatMyContent
    • YouTubeHeader

• VersionSpoofer (Lite) doesn't work with YTLite *(as the version is already spoofed by YTLite to fix YTClassicVideoQuality)*
• Age•restricted videos don't load correctly 29 *(enable "Skip content warning" in YTlite settings to resolve this issue)*
• Hiding Shorts creates an empty black space instead 55

Current YouTube IPA: "19.01.1"  
Current YTLitePlus Version: "2.4"  
Current App Compatibility: "iOS/iPadOS 14.0" or later

RELEASE 18.38.2•2.3.1: (2023•09•26)

• Updated Version Spoofer (Lite) (@arichorn)
• New options (@arichorn)
	• Added option to Hide Account Section
	• Added option to Hide "DontEatMyContent" Section
	• Added option to Hide "YouTube Return Dislike" Section
	• Added option to Hide "YouPiP" Section
	• Added option to Hide "Autoplay" Section
	• Added option to Hide "Try New Features" Section
	• Added option to Hide "Video quality preferences" Section
	• Added option to Hide "Notifications" Section
	• Added option to Hide "Manage all history" Section
	• Added option to Hide "Your data in YouTube" Section
	• Added option to Hide "Privacy" Section
	• Added option to Hide "Live Chat" Section
	• Removed "Disable Wi•Fi Related Settings"
• Fixed all YTLitePlus localizations

Issues in this Release:
• LowContrastMode does not work (Compatible only with YouTube v16.05.7•v17.38.10)
• Shorts are not hidden everywhere (problem with YTLite tweak)
• VersionSpoofer (Lite) doesn't work with YTLite (as the version is already spoofed by YTLite to fix YTClassicVideoQuality)
• Age•restricted videos don't load correctly 29 (enable "Skip content warning" in YTlite settings to resolve this issue)
• VP9 (YTHUD) is currently broken, so resolutions higher than 1080p like 1440p or 4k won't work.

	• Added option to hide search history
	• Added option to remove videos section under the video player
	• Added option to stick sort buttons panel in comments section
	• Added option to hide sort buttons panel in comments section

RELEASE 18.25.1•2.2: (2023•07•07)

• Updated YTLite from "2.1" to "2.2" (@dayanch96) 
  • Added:
    • Extra speed options
    • Auto fullscreen
    • Remove 'Play next in queue' from the menu
    • Remove 'Continue watching' block
  • Fixed:
    • 'Classic Video Quality' option for newer YT versions (See line 278)
    • 'Disable Double Tap To Seek' option for newer YT versions
    • Some Shorts was appearing in Search results
    • Enabled ads was displaying blank blocks instead of ads in home feed

• Added "YTNoCommunityPosts" (@arichorn)
    • Tweak to add a setting to disable all Community Posts on the YouTube app
  
• Added "AppVersionSpoofer" (@arichorn)
    • Mimic YouTube versions to access specific features, layouts, and resolve issues.

• Fixed issue 3 

Issues in this Release:
• LowContrastMode doesn't work (it work with older YT version)
• YTSpeed not working (both broken in v18.19.1+)

Current YouTube IPA: "v18.23.3"  
Current YTLite Version: "v2.1"  
Current App Compatibility: "iOS/iPadOS 14.0" or later

RELEASE 18.23.3•2.1: (June 27th 2023)

• Updated YTLite from "2.0" to "2.1"
  • Added option to Hide "Continue watching" carousel in Home Tab (Other tab)
  • Added option to remove "Play next in queue" in video menu (Other tab)
  • Improved No ads option
  • Improved No Shorts option
  • Fixed Related videos not working
  • Updated Simplified Chinese (Thanks to @xiangfeidexiaohuo)

Issues in this Release:
• LowContrastMode doesn't work (it work with older YT version)
• The old Darkmode doesn't work quite right
